actions.text: Amendments en bloc (A039) offered by Mr. McKeon.
On agreeing to the McKeon amendments (A039) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendments en bloc consist of amendments Nos. 56, 58, 61, 67, 68, 78, 79, 106, 113, 114, 115, 116, 120, 122, 123, and 125 contained in House Report 112-485 and printed on pages H3121-H3125 of the Congressional Record for May 18, 2012.
purpose: Amendments en bloc comprised of the following amendments printed in House Report 112-485: Nos. 56, 58, 61, 67, 68, 78, 79, 106, 114, 113, 115, 116, 120, 122, 123, and 125.
